messages.message: Hmm looks like the run is marked as pass despite 19 suite failures, and the logs cutoff before i can see whether `data-api-utils` worked. Considering I've locally tested the test suite and had a prev run where all other suites passed, I'm inclined to keep this pass and merge after some reviews, but let me know if there's a better practice i should follow here @Cody Boggs
if you don't mind keeping it open for a bit, I'd like to debug that a bit, it's weird

oo i've seen this often with the top getting cut off, and it's been  awhile since i first noticed some button like `view full logs` have disappeared from that screenshot view, but I imagine there's some other jenkins view where I could find em?
ah yep, I'm happy to keep it open for a bit longerr
They shouldn't get truncated ever, I thought. :sweat_smile: one moment please! :smile:

@pauline.comising I'm able to see the full log for run #7 in Jenkins, but in case your browser isn't playing nice (it just loads everything super inefficiently through the Jenkins UI :sob:) Here's a quick query to look at them in Loki: https://grafana.infra.instabase.com/explore?schemaVersion=1&panes=%7B%22y1b%22:%7B%22datas[…]2table%22,%22labelFieldName%22:%22labels%22%7D%7D%7D%7D (https://grafana.infra.instabase.com/explore?schemaVersion=1&panes=%7B%22y1b%22:%7B%22datasource%22:%22loki%22,%22queries%22:%5B%7B%22refId%22:%22A%22,%22expr%22:%22%7Bservice_name%3D%60jenkins-preprod%60%7D%20%7C%20ci_pipeline_id%20%3D%20%60instabase%2FPR-70859%60%20%7C%20ci_pipeline_run_number%20%3D%207%22,%22queryType%22:%22range%22,%22datasource%22:%7B%22type%22:%22loki%22,%22uid%22:%22loki%22%7D,%22editorMode%22:%22code%22,%22direction%22:%22forward%22,%22maxLines%22:3000%7D%5D,%22range%22:%7B%22to%22:%221748469187032%22,%22from%22:%221748455241495%22%7D,%22panelsState%22:%7B%22logs%22:%7B%22columns%22:%7B%220%22:%22Time%22,%221%22:%22Line%22%7D,%22visualisationType%22:%22table%22,%22labelFieldName%22:%22labels%22%7D%7D%7D%7D)

Or one that checks for case-insensitive `err|fail` strings: https://grafana.infra.instabase.com/explore?schemaVersion=1&panes=%7B%22y1b%22:%7B%22datas[…]22logs%22,%22labelFieldName%22:%22labels%22%7D%7D%7D%7D (https://grafana.infra.instabase.com/explore?schemaVersion=1&panes=%7B%22y1b%22:%7B%22datasource%22:%22loki%22,%22queries%22:%5B%7B%22refId%22:%22A%22,%22expr%22:%22%7Bservice_name%3D%60jenkins-preprod%60%7D%20%5Cn%7C%20ci_pipeline_id%20%3D%20%60instabase%2FPR-70859%60%20%5Cn%7C%20ci_pipeline_run_number%20%3D%207%5Cn%7C~%5C%22%28%3Fi%29err%7Cfail%5C%22%22,%22queryType%22:%22range%22,%22datasource%22:%7B%22type%22:%22loki%22,%22uid%22:%22loki%22%7D,%22editorMode%22:%22code%22,%22direction%22:%22forward%22,%22maxLines%22:3000%7D%5D,%22range%22:%7B%22to%22:%221748469187032%22,%22from%22:%221748455241495%22%7D,%22panelsState%22:%7B%22logs%22:%7B%22columns%22:%7B%220%22:%22Time%22,%221%22:%22Line%22%7D,%22visualisationType%22:%22logs%22,%22labelFieldName%22:%22labels%22%7D%7D%7D%7D)

The failures I see at a glance look like bazel tests, but also they seem to be clustered around mypy typechecks. There might be another occurrence of this test in `shared-utils/test-utils/src/test-cmds-mypy.json`

@pauline.comising I actually might have accidentally found the fix for the argument list too long issue. :joy: I'll let you know, but there might be a small fix I can get merged for all affected tests that will make that particular case go away
